    • AbstractReceiver

      public AbstractReceiver(int oppositeMajorFragmentId, List<MinorFragmentEndpoint> senders, boolean spooling)
      Parameters:
      oppositeMajorFragmentId - MajorFragmentId of fragments that are sending data to this receiver.
      senders - List of sender MinorFragmentEndpoints each containing sender MinorFragmentId and Drillbit endpoint where it is running.
